text: A mediator's report shall be filed with the court no later than 10 days after the mediation has terminated, informing the court regarding:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 16-263, see notes following ยง 16-2801.

DC CODE ยง 16-2826

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Whether a settlement was reached; or

If a settlement was not reached, any agreements to narrow the scope of the dispute, limit discovery, facilitate future settlement, hold another mediation session, or otherwise reduce the cost and time of trial preparation.

title.text: Particular Actions, Proceedings and Matters. (Refs & Annos)
